ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: If I guess, will you tell me if I m right? =) * * Some space, just incase my guess is right =) * * Judging by the pattern of other class armors dropped in
ygData.messageBody:
If I guess, will you tell me if I'm right? =)


*
*
Some space, just incase my guess is right =)
*
*













Judging by the pattern of other class armors dropped in Kunark, I'll
say Chardok, since that's where the druid greaves most recently
dropped. The Cobalt ones seem to have dropped in Karnor's, but I
think that was before the item database fix.


Armor research (going by majority):

Vambraces: Old Sebilis
Boots: Karnor's
Gauntlets: Karnor's
Helms: Old Sebilis
Greaves: Chardok
Bracers: Old Sebilis
Breastplates: ??

But there are a few that don't fit the pattern.


--
